So if I remember it correctly, the CVE-2021-40444, CVE-2022‚Äì30190, and now the CVE-2023-36884 are all zero-day attacks because of "Office loading IE engine", it really tells that the hidden-but-not-really-killed IE sitting in Windows is only for zero-day purposes, right, right??
